terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.s1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
terms.s1.body: By accessing or using GoWash services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use our services.
terms.s2.title: 2. Services
terms.s2.body: GoWash provides washer and dryer appliance rental services on a subscription basis. We deliver, install, maintain, and retrieve rental appliances at your residence within our service area.
terms.s3.title: 3. Eligibility
terms.s3.body: You must be at least 18 years old, reside within our service area, and have appropriate washer/dryer hookups at your residence. We reserve the right to verify eligibility before completing any booking.
terms.s4.title: 4. Subscription & Payment
terms.s4.body: Subscriptions are billed monthly via the payment method on file. Your first payment, including any applicable setup fee, is charged at the time of booking. Subsequent payments are charged on the same date each month. All fees are non-refundable except as required by law.
terms.s5.title: 5. Equipment Care
terms.s5.body: You agree to use rented appliances for their intended purpose and in accordance with manufacturer guidelines. You are responsible for damage caused by misuse, negligence, or unauthorized modifications. Normal wear and tear is covered by GoWash at no additional charge.
terms.s6.title: 6. Maintenance & Repairs
terms.s6.body: GoWash covers all maintenance and repairs for normal wear and tear at no cost. You must report any issues promptly. We will schedule a repair or replacement at a mutually convenient time. You agree to provide reasonable access to the equipment for service.
terms.s7.title: 7. Cancellation
terms.s7.body: You may cancel your subscription at any time after any minimum term commitment. Cancellation requires 30 days written notice. Upon cancellation, GoWash will schedule a pickup of the equipment. Early termination during a minimum term may incur an early termination fee.
terms.s8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
terms.s8.body: GoWash is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services or equipment. Our total liability is limited to the amount you have paid in the preceding 12 months.
terms.s9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
terms.s9.body: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance. We will notify you of material changes via email.
terms.s10.title: 10. Contact
terms.s10.body: Questions about these terms? Email us at
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.s1.body: We collect information you provide when booking our services, including your name, email address, phone number, delivery address, and payment information. Payment details are processed securely by Stripe and are never stored on our servers.
privacy.s2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.s2.body: We use your information to process bookings, deliver and maintain equipment, communicate about your account, process payments, and improve our services. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.s3.title: 3. Payment Security
privacy.s3.body: All payment processing is handled by Stripe, a PCI-DSS Level 1 certified payment processor. We do not store credit card numbers or sensitive financial data on our systems.
privacy.s4.title: 4. Data Sharing
privacy.s4.body: We share your information only with service providers necessary to operate our business: Stripe for payment processing, and delivery personnel for equipment installation. We may also disclose information when required by law.
privacy.s5.title: 5. Cookies
privacy.s5.body: We use essential cookies to manage your booking session and authentication. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.
privacy.s6.title: 6. Data Retention
privacy.s6.body: We retain your account information for the duration of your subscription and for a reasonable period afterward for legal and business purposes. You may request deletion of your data by contacting us.
privacy.s7.title: 7. Your Rights
privacy.s7.body: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of non-essential communications at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at the email below.
privacy.s8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
privacy.s8.body: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes via email. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance.
privacy.s9.title: 9. Contact
privacy.s9.body: Questions about your privacy? Email us at
